metadata.title: Basic Component Definition
metadata.remarks: A basic component definition to capture basic component elements and functionality for interoperability testing.

components.title: Auto-Lockout Pro
components.description: Software that when installed implements auto-lockout on an endpoint.

control-implementations.description: Implementation of controls as defined in the Basic Catalog A.

implemented-requirements.description: Auto-Lockout Pro provides the capability to automatically lock user sessions after a defined period of inactivity.

components.title: Password Enforcer
components.description: Software that when installed implements password complexity requirements on an endpoint.

control-implementations.description: Implementation of password complexity controls as defined in the Basic Catalog A.

implemented-requirements.description: Password Enforcer mandates that all passwords must be at least an admin configurable number of characters long and include at least an admin configurable number of numerals.
